title: The Power to change
creator_credit: Third Eye Productions and Jamil Simon
brief_description: Demonstrates alternatives to the traditional pattern of production, distribution and use of energy. Focuses on existing projects throughout the Untied Sates, including urban composting, solar energy on the arm, and wind-powered automobiles.
